metadata.title: CVE-2020-35491 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.8 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related toorg.apache.commons.dbcp2.datasources.SharedPoolDataSource.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
